description: Tees with graphics are much more fun than plain ones. And our River Van Graphic Short Sleeve tee adds to the whimsy with its outdoor-adventure/van-life appeal. It’s made with a blend of recycled polyester and responsibly sourced Merino wool, so you know it’s soft, odor-resistant, moisture-managing, and durable. And don’t forget the quick dry times—even if you’ve amped up your activity, your sweat just won’t sit on your body for long. For a tee with a bit more flair (and probably a lot more comfort) than the plain old cotton ones, this tee has your back.
name: Smartwool River Van Graphic SS Tee - Unisex
